website_summaries.verdict: A good general fishing cage meant for a variety of crabs, shrimp, and fish.
pros: Large size and open top make it easy to catch more fish and crab than traditional nets/cages on a budget
Cage folds up for easy storage when not in use
cons: Not suitable for long soaks where crabs are likely to escape from the top opening

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery, product functions well
customer_reviews.text: Although the net appears to work well as delivered. The material quality is marginal and I don’t expect it to last the summer. This will be a fun toy for kids to catch minnows off the dock. Probably overpriced due to supply chain issues related to the pandemic
customer_reviews.author: W. Fennell

customer_reviews.title: For newbies
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this. Cheap for sure. I was not able to use it, so I don't know how it performs, but it has a real flimsy quality to it. Good for beginners and kids most likely, but not for serious crabbing.
customer_reviews.author: Jalaryde

customer_reviews.title: GOT BAIT!
customer_reviews.text: Really works well, catches the smallest of bait. I used potato rolls, who doesn't like soft moist potato rolls.
customer_reviews.author: IBNFECPO

customer_reviews.title: Great net.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Great quality Except for the green lines. They are plastic and cheap. I had to chnge them out. Overall pretty good net. Huge.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: Crabby crabbers
customer_reviews.text: Used this product as a crab trap. I do not recommend for the use of crabs. Net is not heavy enough to sink to the floor for crabbing even with bait in the pocket. The first day of use it did catch a few crabs however the crabs tore a hole in the mesh netting. This net is not sturdy enough for crabbing but is good for catching bait fish.
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn

customer_reviews.title: Work well, great value
customer_reviews.text: This little net is so cool. We catch a ton of minnows in minutes for our fish tank pets and use them as food and bait.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Flake

customer_reviews.title: Shipped folded up in a mesh bag
customer_reviews.text: Big ring is not strong to pull out of water fast it bends to easy.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it don’t waste your time and money!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste ur time or money not worth it at all. First time I used it the bottom side of the net ripped. Didn’t catch any bait fish. It takes forever for the net to sink. Waste of money and time. Not worth it! Should cost $10 nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: alvin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money
customer_reviews.text: Cheap net broke on the third dip in water Seams broke super fast waste of money Kids were devastated since we got it for our camping trip
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The diameter of the net! Not circumference.
customer_reviews.text: To small, said diameter was 31 in. Well that really was the circumference.
customer_reviews.author: Pj Sebadoh

customer_reviews.title: Fun to catch minnows and bream!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun to use! I toss it in my pond and catch bream and shiners. The food pocket is small and not very useful, so I added a Dollar Tree bra washing bag to the bottom and it works GREAT! I have lots of fun catching fish and throwing them back. I had to order a new one because I left it in the water overnight and something shredded it!
customer_reviews.author: Whiskey Creek CBR

product_meta.title: Portable Folded Fishing Net Fish Shrimp Minnow Crayfish Crab Baits Cast Mesh Trap Automatic
product_meta.description:
Brand Name: RG

Product Name: Portable Folded Fishing Net Hand Casting Cage

Attention: 
*Please keep out of reach of children. 

Warranty: 
*RG adhere to Amazon Return Policy. 
*RG will take full responsibility for any quality problems within 30 days.
feature_bullets: 1. Made of nylon, braided fabric intensive meshes and soft steel material, which it is portable, light and wear resistant.

2. Expanded fishing net size details, top dia: 39.4inch/100cm. bottom dia: 31.5inch/80cm, top dia: 35.1inch/80cm. bottom dia: 23.6inch/60cm, both heights:13.7in/35cm and folded size: dia;9.8inch/25cm.
3. Fishing net is easy to folded, please kindly check the pictures accordinately, portable automatic telescopic fishing shrimp trap, convenient and simple, no need to install.
4. Easy to use. Just pull the string on the top and the net will be automatically opened.
5. Fishing net trap is perfect for catching fishes, crab, lobster, minnows, shrimp and crawfish.
